item.title: Nodule found in former President Biden's prostate during routine physical exam
item.description: A small nodule was found in the prostate of former President Joseph R. Biden during a routine physical exam, a spokesperson said Tuesday.

item.title: U.S., Saudi Arabia sign economic partnership pact
item.description: President Trump and Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman signed a strategic economic partnership agreement in Riyadh on Tuesday.

item.title: Supreme Court Chief Justice Roberts says rule of law is 'endangered'
item.description: Supreme Court Chief Justice John G. Roberts Jr. suggested Monday the rule of law is "endangered" during remarks in Washington.

item.title: Fischer, Sheehy say Golden Dome offers chance for generational leap forward in missile defense
item.description: Sen. Deb Fischer and Sen. Tim Sheehy said President Trump's efforts to improve the U.S. missile defense systems are crucial to securing domestic secur...

item.title: Inflation was steady in April, meaning no sign of tariff shock yet
item.description: Consumer prices rose in April but not as badly as expected, according to a federal inflation report Tuesday that shows President Trump's tariffs have ...
